genmean: Any thing which has a large opening and closing lid which you operate with your whole arm, or any thing or any object directly or indirectly associated with this, especially a car boot.
oldentry: Popular explanation: opening and closing the boot of a car.
nomlex: 1. A covered space usually found at the back of a car in which you carry things such as luggage and shopping. British and Australian English = boot. American English = trunk.
